dt: {bc}a metal band, {a_link|collar}, ferrule, or flange: such as
{bc}a casing or socket for holding a tool (such as a drill bit)
{bc}a circle or flange in which a gem is set

et: Middle French, diminutive of {it}col{/it} collar, from Latin {it}collum{/it} neck {ma}{mat|collar|}{/ma}
shortdef: a metal band, collar, ferrule, or flange: such as
a casing or socket for holding a tool (such as a drill bit)
a circle or flange in which a gem is set
